example.parse: (S-HLN (NP-TPC-1 (DET+NOUN_PROP+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM القاهرة)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS استقطبت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_ACC المعنيين)) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN محادثات) (NP (NOUN_PROP ماشاكوس)))))))

arg.g: the Involved in the Machakos talks
